QuestData.Title: Tools of War
QuestData.Description: Zepik tell me that you maybe the best gorloc hunter he met... other than Zepik. Still big battle to southwest - you go help.$B$BZepik keeps some of biggest, baddest traps in his stash at Kartak's Hold... told Vekgar to use them for battle, so you use them too. Go pick out any traps you want and kill lots of big-tongues.$B$BLots and lots!
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve some of Zepik's traps from his stash in Kartak's Hold. Using the traps, slaughter 50 of the nearby Sparktouched Gorlocs, and then return to Shaman Jakjek in Kartak's Hold.
QuestData.CompletionText: Kind of messy! But still so fun.
QuestData.RewardText: You almost as good with those traps as Zepik!
